steps.title: Put your shirt inside the dryer.
steps.content: Put your shirt inside the dryer.

steps.title: Put a piece of wet cloth inside the dryer.
steps.content: Put a piece of wet cloth inside the dryer. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Set the dryer to dry for 15 to 20 minutes.
steps.content: Set the dryer to dry for 15 to 20 minutes. You will get a good shirt without wrinkles.

steps.title: Take a bath before going out and have your wrinkled shirt accompany you.
steps.content: Take a bath before going out and have your wrinkled shirt accompany you.

steps.title: Hang the shirt inside the bathroom on a rack, rod or any other hanger inside your bathroom.
steps.content: Hang the shirt inside the bathroom on a rack, rod or any other hanger inside your bathroom. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Keep the bathroom door closed for 10 minutes.
steps.content: Keep the bathroom door closed for 10 minutes. This is enough time to moisten your shirt and make it wrinkle free. After 10 minutes of bathing, you can get out and don your unwrinkled t-shirt.

steps.title: Use a pot full of boiled water to make your t-shirt wrinkle free.
steps.content: Use a pot full of boiled water to make your t-shirt wrinkle free. The pot must have a clean base, as it will be placed on your shirt.

steps.title: Take a pot and fill add a small amount of water into it.
steps.content: Take a pot and fill add a small amount of water into it. The water should not be at too high a level, so as to prevent injury as you de-wrinkle your t-shirt. Less than half the water level is sufficient.

steps.title: Bring the water to boil.
steps.content: Bring the water to boil. Get your wrinkled shirt ready on a flat surface.

steps.title: Move the pot and place it on the t-shirt to use the heat to make it wrinkle free.
steps.content: Move the pot and place it on the t-shirt to use the heat to make it wrinkle free. Move it around as needed, until the wrinkles are removed. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Wet or wash your t-shirt.
steps.content: Wet or wash your t-shirt. Hang it on a hanger or spread it on flat surface under the fan or breeze. If you are not in real hurry, hang the t-shirt in open area to dry it automatically with cool breeze.

steps.title: Wait for it to dry.
steps.content: Wait for it to dry. When the shirt has dried, you will see it is free of wrinkles. If you flatten the shirt on a flat surface and move your hands on it, you will be able to remove any remaining wrinkles. This method is good for producing wrinkle-free clothes whenever you want and will save you from ironing your clothes. Wear or fold away for later use.

steps.title: Sprinkle some water on the shirt with your hand or with a spray bottle.
steps.content: Sprinkle some water on the shirt with your hand or with a spray bottle.

steps.title: Flatten the shirt on a chair in front of fan heater.
steps.content: Flatten the shirt on a chair in front of fan heater. The fan heater will remove the wrinkles.

steps.title: Let the t-shirt dry completely.
steps.content: Let the t-shirt dry completely. When dried, you will have a shirt with no wrinkles.

steps.title: Run your hair dryer on medium or high heat.
steps.content: Run your hair dryer on medium or high heat. [4] X Research source [5] X Expert Source Ayad Mirjan Dry Cleaner & Laundry Specialist Expert Interview. 11 August 2021. Spritz some water on your garment before you start blow-drying it. [6] X Expert Source Ayad Mirjan Dry Cleaner & Laundry Specialist Expert Interview. 11 August 2021.

steps.title: Blow air on the t-shirt.
steps.content: Blow air on the t-shirt. Meanwhile, move a piece of damp cloth onto it to flatten the wrinkles.

steps.title: Set the flatiron or hair straightener on maximum heat.
steps.content: Set the flatiron or hair straightener on maximum heat. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Move it over the wrinkled area of your t-shirt.
steps.content: Move it over the wrinkled area of your t-shirt. Press down gently to remove wrinkles. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Take the wrinkled t-shirt and lay it flat on a flat surface.
steps.content: Take the wrinkled t-shirt and lay it flat on a flat surface.

steps.title: Roll it up from one end to another.
steps.content: Roll it up from one end to another.

steps.title: Wait for 15 minutes.
steps.content: Wait for 15 minutes. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Unroll the t-shirt.
steps.content: Unroll the t-shirt. Your shirt is good to go.

steps.title: Use no-wrinkle sprays from a reputed company.
steps.content: Use no-wrinkle sprays from a reputed company. All you need is a t-shirt and your professional spray. Spray the liquid on the tee and let it rest for a few minutes. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Done.
